description: Triangle of coefficients of ordered cycle-index polynomials: T(n,k) = binomial(n,k)*Bell(k)*Bell(n-k).
references: J. Riordan, An Introduction to Combinatorial Analysis, Wiley, 1958, p. 80.
maple: A033306 := proc(n,k)    if k < 0 or k > n then        0;    else        binomial(n,k)*combinat[bell](k)*combinat[bell](n-k) ;    end if;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 21 2013
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := Binomial[n, k] * BellB[k] * BellB[n-k]; Table[t[n, k], {n, 0, 9}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jan 14 2014 *)
crossrefs: Cf. A000110, row sums give A001861.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
